alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:37AM EST until December 18 at 7:22PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Canajoharie Creek near Canajoharie. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The creek is out of its banks and floods nearby properties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:17 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Canajoharie Creek Canajoharie Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 8 am: 8.3 &&
